title: Advanced Diagnostics - Suspected Fiber Cut
description: An entire neighborhood loses internet service simultaneously. The agent must investigate for a potential fiber cut.

tasks.description: Acknowledge multiple customer reports of outages in a specific geographic area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a cluster of outage reports.

tasks.description: Check the network monitoring system for the status of the main fiber node serving that area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the fiber node is reporting a 'Loss of Signal' (LOS) alarm.

tasks.description: Escalate to the network operations center (NOC) with a 'Priority 1 - Suspected Fiber Cut' ticket.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a P1 ticket and escalates it to the NOC.
